common

Class ScoreManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • common.ScoreManager

  • public class ScoreManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages the Level, Health and Money at gameplay Its holds constants of LEVEL, HEALTH, MONEY TITLE
